TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyboardNavigation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可焦點化物件之間的邏輯巡覽和方向式巡覽。

span.span: Provides logical and directional navigation between focusable objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責實作預設的鍵盤焦點導覽，按下其中一個導覽鍵時。The class is responsible for implementing default keyboard focus navigation when one of the navigation keys is pressed. 導覽鍵是︰ tab 鍵，Shift + Tab、 Ctrl + Tab、 Ctrl + Shift + Tab、 向上箭號，向下箭號、 LeftArrow 和向右鍵。The navigation keys are: Tab, Shift+Tab, Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab, UpArrow, DownArrow, LeftArrow, and RightArrow keys. 邏輯巡覽的範例使用 tab 鍵將焦點移。An example of logical navigation is using the tab key to move focus. 方向式巡覽的範例使用方向鍵將焦點移。An example of directional navigation is using the arrow keys to move focus. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數目的物件。The following example creates a with a number of objects. 附加的屬性設定為上。The attached property is set to on the . 這表示當使用 tab 鍵在變更焦點、 焦點會移動每個項目和最後一個項目到達時就會回到第一個項目。This means that when focus is changed using the tab key within the , focus will move from each element and when the last element is reached focus will return to the first element. [!code-xaml[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationxaml)] [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)]
